org.canova.image.transform

Class ScaleImageTransform

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.canova.image.transform.BaseImageTransform<Mat>
      • org.canova.image.transform.ScaleImageTransform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImageTransform

    public class ScaleImageTransform
extends BaseImageTransform<Mat>
    Scales images deterministically or randomly.

        public ScaleImageTransform(java.util.Random random,
                   float dx,
                   float dy)
        Constructs an instance of the ImageTransform.
        Parameters:
        random - object to use (or null for deterministic)
        dx - maximum scaling in width of the image (pixels)
        dy - maximum scaling in height of the image (pixels)

    • Method Detail

      • transform

        public ImageWritable transform(ImageWritable image,
                      java.util.Random random)
        Description copied from interface: ImageTransform
        Takes an image and returns a transformed image. Uses the random object in the case of random transformations.
        Parameters:
        image - to transform, null == end of stream
        random - object to use (or null for deterministic)
        Returns:
        transformed image
